definition: The term "gesundheitlich" refers to something related to the state of being healthy or pertaining to health. It is commonly used to describe matters, conditions, or factors that are associated with physical or mental well-being.

examples.german: Die gesundheitliche Situation hat sich verbessert.
Es gibt viele gesundheitliche Risiken bei Rauchen.
examples.english: There are many health risks associated with smoking.

examples.german: Die gesundheitliche Versorgung in diesem Land ist sehr gut.
examples.english: The healthcare in this country is very good.

examples.german: Er hat gesundheitliche Probleme und muss ins Krankenhaus.
examples.english: He has health problems and needs to go to the hospital.
